name: COVID-2019
event_type: STANDARD TREATMENT PROTOCOL FOR ASYMPTOMATIC / MILD SYMPTOMATIC COVID CASES

protocol.medication: Tab Paracetamol 650 Mg Three times Daily (Patients with body weight more than 50 Kg, if Temperature is More than 100Â°F , Not required if no Fever)
Tab Ivermectin 200 Micrograms/ Kg/ Day (One 12 Mg Tablet for adults) once daily after dinner X for 5 days
Cap Doxycycline 100 Mg Twice daily for adults (Not for pregnant ladies or Lactating mothers and children under 12 years of age )
Tab Azithromycin 10 mg / Kg/ Day , 500 mg for adults, Once daily X for 5 days (For pregnant ladies or Lactating mothers and Children under 12 years of age )
Tab Vitamin C 500 Mg One Tablet Thrice Daily for adults X for 10 Days
Tab Zinc 50 Mg 1 tab Twice Daily for adults X for 10 days
Tab / Cap B- Complex Once Daily for adults X for 10 days
Vitamin D3 60000 Units for adults Once in a week, with water or milk for 3 weeks.

notes: Note : Ivermectin and Doxycycline will not be given to pregnant and lactating ladies and children under 12 years of age. Use Azithromycin in these cases.

DISCLAIMER : The purpose of this slide is to let the treating physician know about Standard treatment protocol, as there is a lot of confusion and many unauthenticated and incorrect protocols are circulating on social media.
